body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Austin Jenkins and the customer's name is Linda Nelson.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon! Welcome to MetaCar. My name is Austin Jenkins, and I'm here to assist you today. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Linda! How can I help you today? Are you looking to rent a car or do you need assistance with an existing reservation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a reservation, but I'm feeling a bit frustrated with the process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m really sorry to hear that, Linda. I’m here to help resolve any issues. Could you provide me with your reservation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Could you also provide me with your date of birth, in order to verify your identity?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Linda. Let me check your reservation details right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your patience. I will make sure your issue is resolved. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Linda. If you need any further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
